website_summaries.verdict: Turns and burns in 360 degrees and engineered with smart features to enhance use.
pros: Releases handles, locks, and unlocks with the press of a single button
A carry-on designed for long trips in a variety of environments
We love the laundry smart feature that compartmentalizes clothing while away from home
Sturdy shell can hold up to all types of travel modalities

customer_reviews.title: Update...Used 3 times now
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but I like it. Bought because of the compartments and laundry section. I'm going on a longer trip soon so I'll see if the size is ok when I have to pack more. UPDATE...Used 3 times now and handle broke. I would not buy this again. I'd suggest not buying if you travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Nunez

customer_reviews.title: and marks wipe off easily; but it just wasn't very durable
customer_reviews.text: Shell of the suitcase cracked below where the telescoping handle connects to the case during the first 5-day trip out. It handles scuffs reasonably well, and marks wipe off easily; but it just wasn't very durable. Attempting to return.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after returning from a trip and Having my suitcase damaged. I received it with in 2 days which was great cause I was leaving on business the day after it arrived. I took the 29” with me and so far it’s amazing super light and can hold a lot of articles. The wheels are fantastic this suitcase glides on hard surfaces very nicely and quiet. I definitely recommend this suitcase case to anyone who travels a lot or anyone looking for a great quality suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert hershman

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and small
customer_reviews.text: The quality was not up to expectations for the price. The interior pockets were too small to be practical. The Amazon one for less than 1/3 of the price is of much better quality. I returned the overpriced one.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Mom

customer_reviews.title: They promised a great product and they delivered!
customer_reviews.text: First carry on suitcase that I really like. I packed for 8 days and while tight, it worked as promised. Loved not having to check in luggage. Strongly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Lingofelter

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Genius Pack horrible customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and after three uses the lining and stiching is coming apart. After contacting Genius Pack cutomer service they tell me it is normal wear and tear and if I do not like their policy to tskr it up eith Amazon! The case is just over a year old with three trips and I now will throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wheels do not feel as sturdy as previous luggage I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is okay but not a high quality as I had hoped for considering recommendations from realmenrealstyle.com. The internal pockets are an interesting concept, but I am not convinced well designed. The handle is rather loose. The wheels do not feel as sturdy as previous luggage I have purchased. A decent piece of kit, but I am unlikely to buy the brand in future.
customer_reviews.author: M Center

customer_reviews.title: Best bag going
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent. We rested two of these - brushed chrome for me and hunter green for my wife. We currently have them full for a three week trip through Central Europe by train and plane. One reason we bought these is that they fit ALL airlines carry on requirements. They are also professional looking but heavy duty. In my bag I have 7 pairs of socks, 7 pairs of underwear, two pairs of shorts, 3 portable hard drives, 7 or 8 shirts/t shirts, toiletries, a bag of electronic cables, toiletries, brush, 3 eyeglass cases, and assorted odds and ends and sundries. Not too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Doig

customer_reviews.title: Should of known better
customer_reviews.text: Of course it looked hideous after one flight. I got this thinking it would be so easy to spot but turns out lots of travelers had the same plan as there where several white cases and tho this was my bags first flight it looked the worst. So maybe it had a rougher journey, but sadly it's a lot worse for the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good ........
customer_reviews.text: We received the Genius Pack Suitcases (I ordered 2 pair) on time and in tip top condition. They are exactly as profiled in ads, on TV and on Youtube. I have not used them yet. The true test will come in July and August and we do some serious traveling. I love what I see and can't wait to put them to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Jill Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this because of mixed reviews. After receiving the product, I absolutely love how much this luggage can hold and it's super light weight which helps when you are a heavy packer and need to meet that 50 lb weight limit. The built in pockets are perfect size to keep things organized and in the 29" one there is a side that says "laundry" but I just used it to store shoes so they wouldn't get any of the clothes dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Handle broken before use
customer_reviews.text: Love these suitcases but the handle on the small one is broken before we even used it (doesn’t expand)
customer_reviews.author: stacey warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of luggage. I’ve carried it on a plane and it fits the over head storage perfectly. I flew back from Israel and checked it. The hard case held up well & after two more additional flights, it came through with only a fe minor scuffs after starting out brand new. I expect this luggage to last a lifetime. I am glad I invested in it. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: randy painter

customer_reviews.title: The perfect carry on luggage
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the suitcase is pretty impressive. The little details really show the effort made for this to really be worth the investment instead of a Samsonite. I chose the white and was Impressed by the white texture, it’s not just some hard shell white plastic, it has this mesh texture. The inside is perfectly laid out and labeled for everything to go in its place. I don’t really have anything negative to say. I’m going to buy the larger version to match now.
customer_reviews.author: Fame

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions meet Carry-on Standards
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because it specifically mentioned that it works with United Airlines's strict carry-on rules. I double checked the dimensions (on the United website) and the suitcase happened to be a bit smaller than the guidelines. Even better in my opinion as the size of carry-ons allowed on board continue to shrink. Seems roomy inside and can't wait for my trip! A little pricey but peace of mind was worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with this suitcase. It rolls effortlessly and is very light. By rolling my clothes I had no problem packing all I needed for an eight-day trip to Rome.
customer_reviews.author: DTF

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm happy. The white
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy. The white, amazingly, stays clean. Lightweight and love the 4 wheels. But I have no idea how they think you can pack for two weeks in this thing. With shoes, toiletries, a flat Iron and clothes, packing for three days filled this completely.
customer_reviews.author: Green Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carry on for a long weekend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carry on for a long weekend. I actually packed for over a week and was happy that I was able to include clothing items to wear at least twice without repeating a "look". Love the compartments, and that you can stuff it full and still closes easily. Compares with a Tumi but lots less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: mashenn

customer_reviews.title: GeniusPack 21" Aerial- Beautiful and quality product. It came just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Genius Pack 21" Aerial carry-on luggage (in matte white). It came as advertised- light, durable and very aesthetically pleasing. I only wished that they had put in a built-in combination lock for this particular model. I am still waiting for the availability on the 25" model since it is still shown as sold out on the GeniusPack website.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Phan

customer_reviews.title: This suitcase is wonderful. It feels nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is wonderful. It feels nice and sturdy. I love the little pockets enclosed. If you pack neatly and plan ahead, you can fit a good amount of stuff in it. The white gets a little dirty but it seems to be easily cleanable.
customer_reviews.author: Violette

customer_reviews.title: Got Mine in the Gunmetal Gray and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase many carry on bags in the last 2 years looking for the right one...so far I think I found it. My favorite part about this bag is the pockets inside. There are two full side for storing lots of clothes as well as the service pockets clearly labeled so you do not forget to pack anything! I definitely fit more on this bag than I do in any of my other carry on bags. The wheels and the handle move effortlessly and do not get stuck. I would efinitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Genius Pack is Smart Packing!
customer_reviews.text: I carried the Hardside on yesterday for the first time. I like that anything fragile or sensitive such as medicine or jewelry that I want with me, not in the hold of the plane, can't be squished. I prefer the soft side Genius Pack (G3--or is it G4? We have two) for all my clothes -- holds so much! -- but the Hardside Spinner is the perfect carry-on: handsome, easy to maneuver and fits in overheads. The G3/G4 has the advantage of side pockets for travel docs, reading material, other stuff you forget until the last second, but the Hardside makes you think it all through ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: ACROMANO

customer_reviews.title: Interior pockets Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how the individual sections of this suitcase would work. Well, it really does help. Used it this past weekend and those sections really made the packing easy. Back home I went to the washing machine and unloaded my dirty things straight into the machine. Clean shirts remained clean. Super idea.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton D Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time but used
customer_reviews.text: The carry on arrived on time but used. It had scratches all over the corners and the large interior zip was unzipped and flopped open. The wheels looks ok, but dirty. I liked the bag enough and needed to travel the following day so I kept it. It's good enough. Not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: abee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Carry-on at a Reasonable Price Used my carry-on for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Carry-on at a Reasonable Price Used my carry-on for the first time on a 4 day city get away. It more than accommodated what I packed--and as usual I packed too much! I have back problems, but it was ez to manage because of its weight and 360 wheel capabilities. Final bonus was the labeling of the zip pockets for those who tend to forget something.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for the right size carry-on luggage, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for 21x14x9 luggage for carry-on. I once ordered Travelpro 21 inch luggage, but the true measurement was 23 inches high and I had to return it. But this one has true measurements all around. I ordered white color luggage thinking it might be too whitish, but I was surprised that it's so cute looking with black liners. It's about 6.8 lb and has several compartments inside. Everything looks durable. I'm going to give another review after the 2 weeks Europe trip. So far, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is very lightweight and I love the organizational pockets inside it as well As they do not forget list. I have not yet gotten the battery charged for the iPhone and iPad but I watch the video and learn how to do that
customer_reviews.author: SadieKaty

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took it on a two-day trip last week! It rolled as smooth as silk as I rushed across the pavement to the terminal, through TSA pre-check, and to my gate. I couldn't be happier with it. I'm definitely going to buy the larger version as well.
customer_reviews.author: T Norman Burke

customer_reviews.title: Organized small easy to maneuver carry on
customer_reviews.text: Love the inside, it’s holds so much and I feel very organized when traveling with it. The wheels are a bit stiff and can use some wd-40 or some else I would rate it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Romo

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate measurement
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good bag although I haven't used it yet. I need a 21.5" carryon for European travel (they're very strict in my experience), and this bag measures 22" when handle and wheels are included. I have contacted company to see if they agree that this does not meet the required 21.5", and have not had a satisfactory reply. I may need to send it back and purchase a 20" bag from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: pens

customer_reviews.title: Best gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the carry on for my dad who has been dying to get one after he saw and used mine. It was the best gift I could have giving him! Very happy with the carry-on style, durability and design.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hard sided roller bags
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape and uniquely packed one inside the other. Lightweight. Hard sided cases with very good zippers. Roller bag which we definitely needed.
customer_reviews.author: CGM

customer_reviews.title: but this carry on was great. I was worried when it first arrived as ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually post reviews, but this carry on was great. I was worried when it first arrived as it looked small. But it fit so much stuff! And lots of organization. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Debuj

customer_reviews.title: It’s terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a “light” packer. I always overpack—just in case. With this carryon, I fit clothes, makeup, shoes, etc. for at least five days. It’s the first time I didn’t need to pay for a checked piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for travel to Europe. They are just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Sawitke

customer_reviews.title: Too much PR hype for an ok piece
customer_reviews.text: Super aggressive requests to leave feedback. So here goes. We bought it. Returned it. All the hype and nothing groundbreaking. The main reason for the return was the small size. It had a few compartments but they were really just a few extra pockets in the mesh separator.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Silin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: The black liner stained my Clothes and then the outside split open. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Phanson

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy, except for the zipper pulls
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size and I love the compartments. Very sturdy. My hesitation is that the zipper pulls keep coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm Mama

customer_reviews.title: all I know is that I love the look - the featherweight - an the mobility
customer_reviews.text: Cannot provide too many details yet - taking my new Genius Pack on its first trip this week. So far, all I know is that I love the look - the featherweight - an the mobility. We'll see how these attributes are affected post packing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, not sturdy or durable , terrible return policy
customer_reviews.text: Good news very lightweight. Like the inside features Bad news: easily scratched / scuffed ( should have gotten the soft side piece ) not very sturdy and most importantly returns or exchanges not allowed once used. Unlike AWAY which allows you to try luggage and return if not satisfied. This makes Away a better choice
customer_reviews.author: Scott Saxon

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Got this suitcase yesterday for a trip I took last night. Delivered super fast, on time for my trip. It is very sturdy, rolled through the airport with ease! Also, extremely lightweight. I love all the interior compartments. Kept me organized for my trip. Overall, my new favorite suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Julio S

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT HAPPY. LEAVING FOR VACATION. TOMORROW AND LUGGAGE ARRIVED WITHOUT THE INTERNAL BATTERY PACK THATS NEEDED TO CHARGE CELL PHONES. CANT EVEN LOCATE MANUFACTURES PHONE NUMBER. WHAT A WASTE!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. The large one was roomier than I expected. Easily held enough stuff for a Couple of weeks. It seems like the outside get smart easily other than that terrific
customer_reviews.author: Robin Banchik

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I just received it. It is very light. The zipper and the wheels seem very stable. That is usually where I have problem with luggage. I travel a lot and plan to use this month. Will repost when I find out how it travels and packs. First impression was very good. Beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Jody McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger hard size for longer trips but this is perfect for 3-5 days. Very light, and all the same features as it's larger sibling. The only thing missing is a built in lock.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice carry on
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice carry on and well organized interior. The one drawback was each interior side had zippers that are sewn in wrong side out so the pulls are on the inside. I needed it quickly so was unable to return for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect piece of luggage. Very easy for me to pick up and is very compact. Looking forward to using it on my next trip in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peachy

customer_reviews.title: You’ve gotta get this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubby. He used it for a 6 day trip and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: rl

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight, easy to roll luggage
customer_reviews.text: We gave this luggage to our daughter for a wedding present. She hasn't used it yet, so I can't review durability, but it is light-weight and very easy to roll around.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: On first look.....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the laundry compartment! Zippers seem sturdy, love the hunter green color, seems very organized which is a plus and wheels work well... can't wait to give it a go.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice carry on case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice carry on case. I am returning it as it's smaller than I really wanted. ordering a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Maskell

customer_reviews.title: Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Best laggauge ever and worth every penny Excelent quality very light weight super easy to drag at the airport
customer_reviews.author: NAZEK Nakoud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Packed so much for 10 days. Just my size. Now my friends want one.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: High style  and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly lightweight, stylish and innovative for luggage . Worth the price in quality.
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR SCHUPBACH

customer_reviews.title: There is no easy way to pull open or closed
customer_reviews.text: The zipper for the laundry is put incorrectly. There is no easy way to pull open or closed. Plan to return.
customer_reviews.author: Disabledwoman27

customer_reviews.title: Best. Suitcase. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best suitcase I have ever purchased. It is amazing how much I could pack in it and still keep it under weight for international carry-on rules. Shipping was quick And it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the organizational labels inside. However I found the zipper mechanism to be inferior to the product. They ‘caught’ when going around the curved edge; there was no zipper garage for the pulls and no TSA lock
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, organized and eight weight!
customer_reviews.text: The genius pack is sleek, organized and extremely light weight! It's an outstanding suitcase and all you need for brief trips.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this purchase
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this purchase!! Just used the smaller carry-on and can't believe how much it could hold. And SO happy I don't have to look for some brawny air passenger to assist me in lifting my carryon to the upper compartment - I can now do it by myself!!! LOVE the compartments - so easy!!! Thanks for making a small part of my traveling life "dummy proof".
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I love the sleek look of it and the pockets/sections are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek look of it and the pockets/sections are great for organization. Really helpful. My biggest issue was that it doesn't give at all! I packed as small as I could for a 4day island vacay and zipping up was definitely an issue.
customer_reviews.author: NDGB

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I love this suitcase! Lots of room and helps me organize my packing. I use compression packing cubes and can get a lot in here. I am taking it as my carry on and only suitcase for a 10 day trip to peru.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on with zippered organizing pockets
customer_reviews.text: Just took it to Paris and the pockets are wonderful. Checked it through and it came out clean and with no dings.
customer_reviews.author: Ink user

customer_reviews.title: Great light carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet, but I am so pleased with this carry-on! Using the packing cubes I purchased as well, I have plenty of clothes for my 10 day trip to Scotland. It’s light and the pockets are great for organizing my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haved not used the Genius Pack 21 as of ...
customer_reviews.text: I haved not used the Genius Pack 21 as of yet, as I bought for a trip coming up in October. But as I looked at the inside and all, I think it is going to be exactly what I want. Very excited!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, wheels glide
customer_reviews.text: The big is light, even when fully packed, holds plenty, fits nicely in the overhead and the wheels are awesome. You can dance effortlessly with your bag through the airport!
customer_reviews.author: K. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & compact
customer_reviews.text: Question. I thought the area for dirty laundry can out? The zipper is difficult to maneuver. Am I incorrect? Thank you Other then that it appears very sturdy & am looking forward to using it over the summer
customer_reviews.author: robert platania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent luggage. Wheels are great. Nice touch with the different compartments. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: John Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Used it for a 7 day trip and there was plenty of space for clothes and essentials.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Travel light
customer_reviews.text: This set up is awesome. It has streamlined and refined my packing experience. It has become effortless
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: great product. Thought it came with the cable, but it wasnt included. Also bought it then a day later the price was reduced by $40.
customer_reviews.author: DTT

customer_reviews.title: The look is pretty impressive at the beginning but the socket and underwear ...
customer_reviews.text: The look is pretty impressive at the beginning but the socket and underwear compartment is really small that one can only fit in 2-3 pairs which makes it not very practical. The handle is also not as sturdy as expected for the price.. a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LIU Zhiyuan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering a Tumi bag so am confused when this bag arrived but my daughter loved it! Is it made by Tumi under a different name?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kurachek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on hard case luggage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, easy to maneuver and lightweight even fully packed.
customer_reviews.author: Evinrude

customer_reviews.title: I also liked how I was able to fit a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: The style and the way looks! I also liked how I was able to fit a lot of things inside!
customer_reviews.author: Alton Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor! Return on investment is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great carry on! I will never pay for baggage fees or check in luggage ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I love the look of the suitcase but the handle broke after one trip and now it's unusable. Can someone help, I'm am disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nadine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push or pull
customer_reviews.text: Holds more than you think based on the size. Easy to push or pull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Light and easy to maneuver. Lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Francis

customer_reviews.title: The suitcase arrived in good condition. I will be using it in September ...
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase arrived in good condition. I will be using it in September so we will see how good it holds up! It is a very nice suitcase
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I had to do the "airport dash" in Salt Lake City, and the bag didn't disappoint. Smooth rolling, no hiccups whatsoever. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ramaj Media Inc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good styling wise...My first trip starts tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: I feel so empowered with only one bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. The mesh pockets are really great. I don't necessarily put the stuff that it is labeled for, but it works just as well. It is just the right size. I just returned from a 10 day trip. Was able to pack all I needed with just one trip to the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: CP Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move, sturdy and attractive:)
customer_reviews.text: Product used for trips. Very durable and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: joy p

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile as a traveller.
customer_reviews.text: Love this genius luggage. So well-designed. So light to carry. So easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Jericho

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: It is so light, easy to pack for 9 days in Ireland and keeps me organized!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking carry on
customer_reviews.text: Just got bag have not traveled with it yet - plan to use it weekly (flight crew) Very light weight seems durable and I like the look - the inside compartments are great! I transferred all my things from my old case same size and somehow I have room to spare. the only thing this bag needs is a usb port! and maybe if you could keep the clean lines some sort of outside pocket for an umbrella or quick grab items. Looking forward to using this bag
customer_reviews.author: reds2k

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage piece
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage piece, can't wait to hit the road! Only oddity was the unit came with an odd black mark. Can't tell if it's a marker or what. Oh well, don't feel like going through the send back process.
customer_reviews.author: drewmd

customer_reviews.title: A classy Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Granddaughter. You should have seen her eyes light up when she unwrapped it for her 8th birthday ! Taught her about packing cubes. Valuable lesson for spacial relationships. We couldn't be more pleased. BRAVO Genius Pack Team a classy product.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Chapel Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL STUFF WILL GET BACK TO YOU ON DURABILITY ON A LATER DATE.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Poloncarz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight / very well organized / wheels function as designed
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Light, trendy, and oh-so-smooth wheels. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Light, functional, and trendy, and the wheels are so smooth. I was worried about the white color, but the surface has a texture that makes it easy to wipe. Can't wait to use it for my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie H Kim

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return it
customer_reviews.text: This bag was much smaller than carry one bags I use. I would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered chrome color and received black, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered chrome color and received black, and the zipper pull inside on the right is missing. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Latte Lover

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe they have the gall to charge so ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe they have the gall to charge so much for this flimsy thing. I knew I should not have spent so much for something I had not, personally touched. Shame on me for believing the hype!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Axe

customer_reviews.title: Great carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Love this carry-on. It's compact, seems durable, feels light and looks stylish .
customer_reviews.author: l urbin11

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hype-very overrated.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this product. There is no way to compress dirty laundry as advertised. The reviews suggest that one can go on 7-10 day trips without a problem. Not sure what people pack but there is no way I could fit enough stuff in the suitcase. The pockets for underwear and socks are ridiculously small. Finally there is not even a way to extend size as is usual on much cheaper bags.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Katze

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: The form and function of this carry-on are very good! It's my new "go to" bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Harty

customer_reviews.title: I plan to use a small backpack as my personal item (tortuga 27 L) that opens and is compartmentalized like a suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and well conceived. I bought this to use as a carry on and wanted to be sure it would work on any airlines even international. I was surprised at how much I could pack and the compartments will help me to stay organized. I plan to use a small backpack as my personal item (tortuga 27 L) that opens and is compartmentalized like a suitcase. It may be stretching the size limit for a personal item but if packed lightly it should easily fit under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like how light it is. I still prefer to check my bag - I'm hoping it will survive
customer_reviews.author: karen m schluntz

customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the same although there were different sizes I like

product_meta.title: Genius Pack Hardside Luggage Spinner - Smart, Organized, Lightweight Suitcase - TSA Approved Cabin Size (Aerial - Brushed Chrome)
feature_bullets: ✅ EXTREME ORGANIZATION - Interior category compartments for socks, chargers, undergarments with a permanently embedded packing checklist
✅ MAXIMUM SIZE, MINIMUM WEIGHT - Weighs only 6.2 pounds! Meets both international and domestic requirements
✅ HANDSOME SLIDER - 100% aluminum telescoping handle with 2 lock positions and rubberized push button for enhanced comfort; Scratch and stain resistant
✅ EFFORTLESS MANEUVERABILITY - Whisper-quiet 360-degree durable spinner wheels make for a smooth ride on any surface.

✅ 5 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY - At Genius Pack, our main priority is to provide our customers with high quality products and a hassle-free travel experience. In any event where you encounter a problem with your Genius Pack product, it is covered under a 5 year limited warranty, effective from the date of purchase.
